mapper.sql: SELECT R.REVIEW_NO reviewNo, R.RESERVATION_NO reservationNo, R.STORE_NO storeNo, R.USER_NO userNo, R.REVIEW_CONTENT reviewContent, R.STORE_GRADE storeGrade, R.REVIEW_DATE createDate, RI.IMAGE reviewImageUrl, RI.IMAGE_NO imageNo FROM TB_REVIEW R LEFT JOIN TB_REVIEW_IMAGE RI ON R.REVIEW_NO = RI.REVIEW_NO
mapper.select: SELECT R.REVIEW_NO reviewNo, R.REVIEW_CONTENT reviewContent, R.STORE_GRADE storeGrade, R.REVIEW_DATE createDate, S.STORE_NAME storeName, RI.IMAGE reviewImageUrl FROM TB_REVIEW R JOIN TB_STORE S ON R.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO LEFT JOIN TB_REVIEW_IMAGE RI ON R.REVIEW_NO = RI.REVIEW_NO WHERE R.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND R.IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY R.REVIEW_DATE DESC
WHERE R.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} ORDER BY R.REVIEW_DATE DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TB_REVIEW ( REVIEW_NO, RESERVATION_NO, STORE_NO, USER_NO, REVIEW_CONTENT, STORE_GRADE, REVIEW_DATE ) VALUES ( #{reviewNo}, #{reservationNo}, #{storeNo}, #{userNo}, #{reviewContent}, #{storeGrade}, SYSDATE )
